resources.string:
Hi, my name is Richard. 

I am a student at the College of Southern Nevada. 

I am currently in the final semester of my software programming degree. 

I have a lot of pets at home. 

We currently have 3 dogs, 2 rabbits, a hamster, a degu, a fish, a leopard gecko, a chameleon, and a bearded dragon. 

I am a Veteran of the United States Navy. 

I spent 9 years in the Navy. 

My goals are to finish my programming degree, then move on to receive a degree in System Admin as well as Database and Web Development. 

Beyond college it is my hope to find employment in a software engineering field.
